title: Chris Hemsworth AKA Thor Installs Hundreds Of Solar Panels In His Rs 140 Crore Mansion
text:
Ever since environment has become a topic of discussion and concern, actors from across the world are taking tiny steps to improve it. Whether Bollywood or Hollywood, celebrities are using their power and status to bring about a change and make the world a better place.

Twitter

One such star is Chris Hemsworth. The actor who featured as Thor has installed hundreds of solar panels on the roof of his $20 million (Rs 142 crore) Byron Bay mega-mansion in Australia. The actor who is originally from Australia will be moving in with his wife Elsa Pataky and their three children in November, reports dailymail.co.uk.

As their house nears completion after three years of construction work, it appears that Chris and Elsa are hoping to rely on renewable energy sources as much as possible. The roof is now almost completely covered with rectangular solar panels, which will provide plenty of electricity during the hotter months. Take a look.

The mansion reportedly has a rooftop infinity pool, gym, steam room, another big pool, six bedrooms, media room, games room and a spa. We hope other actors also take cue from the popular star and work towards having a better world.
